oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Experimental and numerical investigation of one-dimensional waterflood in porous reservoir
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: HADIA, N
CHAUDHARI, L
AGGARWAL, A
MITRA, SK
VINJAMUR, MADHU
SINGH, R
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: computer simulation
mechanical permeability
enhanced recovery
numerical methods
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Experimental and numerical investigation of relative permeability and oil recovery from the porous reservoir are described for short and long core samples. The relative permeability ratios, which are function of water saturation, obtained from laboratory core flooding experiments have been used for prediction of oil recovery through numerical simulation of non-dimensional Buckleyâ€“Leverett equation. The simulation results for oil recovery compared well with recovery results obtained from core flooding experiments.
